 2017-04762017-05-05,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act
SubjectFrancine Valois ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Paul Trudeau **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to FRANCINE VALOIS, survivor of the Hon. Paul Trudeau, a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court for the District of Montreal, in and for the Province of Quebec, effective February 13, 2017.
AttachmentsAttachment
